name: Audio Navigation Research Prototype
description:
Hello! Thank you for joining in on our study about navigation through sound within video games. We are testing whether this mechanic could be used in future games to create a unique aspect of games.

Playtesting is no longer active! But feel free to try it out if you are curious!

PLEASE ONLY TEST WITH HEADPHONES! 

After you download the file, you will need to extract the files and then click the "Audio Navigation Prototype" in order to open the application!

We will be testing your speed throughout the maze and test level, so be as fast as you can!

This is an audio experiment so remember to have your volume loud.

AFTER YOUR FINISH PLEASE: please SCREENSHOT and EMAIL us THE END SCREEN of the maze to CLOSED This is vital to our study as we collect data. Fill in our survey it will take 2 minutes: https://forms.gle/sUEiEcSe6MXPSzhFA 

CONTROLS: WASD to move Mouse to look 

Thank you again for participating and we hope you enjoy it!

This research prototype was created for a research paper at Uppsala University Campus Gotland
